name: Rising Nausea
description:
"Uh, it's me. I've got some important information for you, Avi." Rising Nausea follows a man nicknamed Avi who goes to an unamed town to meet with a person who has gone missing. Explore this town to see what sorts of unique occurences happen. The game has three endings, a bonus area, and a lot of areas left to be explored. The game features three main characters and has an average runtime of 20 minutes. WARNING: If you are sensitive to blood, gore, or any of the likes, I suggest to not play the game because the game has a bit of this! 

IN TROUBLESHOOTING, THE GAME USES THE FOLLOWING FONTS TO RUN PROPERLY:

Architext (MUST DOWNLOAD! The game will not load properly without this font.)

Connection Serif (Optional font. Download it if you want the game to look better.)

Tinos (Regular) (Supposedly, you wouldn't need to download this but if the text looks improper you may attempt to download this.)

DEV NOTE:

Hello! This is my very first game! I'm very sorry if you don't like it. This is a simple test game to see what I can do with Wolf RPG Editor. If you want to say something, you may contact me here:

Twitter (@mocharyotic)
